TumourCount.description: Tumour identifier coded sequentially from 1 to max number of tumours per pathology report. Dataset has one row per tumour.

ReportCount.description: Pathology Report identifier coded sequentially from 1 to max number of pathology reports per individual

Edat.description: Date Data Entered by coder extracting data from the pathology report.

ReportDat.description: Date of Report. Missing information is null (blank)

CoreDat.description: Date of Core biopsy. Missing information is null (blank)

DateSpecimenTaken.description: Specimen taken date. Missing is coded as null (blank)

DateSpecimenReceived.description: Specimen received in hospital laboratory. Missing is coded as null (blank)

Primary_Site.description: Primary site of the cancer. Missing or not applicable is coded as null

Stage_FIGO.description: FIGO tumour stage (any edition). Missing is coded as null (blank).

Stage_UICC.description: UICC tumour stage (any edition). Missing is coded as null (blank)

Stage_Other_Not_Reported.description: Tumour stage where system is not reported or is other. Missing is coded as null (blank)

Stage_Best.description: Tumour stage to be used in analysis. Where multiple stage systems reported, FIGO to be prioritised. Missing is coded as null (blank)

Benign_Tumour.description: Type of benign ovarian tumour. Missing or not applicable is coded as null (blank)

Borderline.description: Type of borderline ovarian tumour. Missing or not applicable is coded as null (blank)

Invasive.description: Invasive. Missing is coded as null (blank)

Epithelium.description: Type of epithelial tumour. Missing or not applicable is coded as null (blank)Type

Grade_HL.description: Grade differentiation. Missing is coded as null (blank)

Primary_Germ_Cells.description: Type of Germ (Egg) Cell Tumour. Missing or not applicable is coded as null (blank)

Sex_Cord_Stromal_Cells.description: Type of Ovary sex Cord Stromal Tumour Cells (SCSTs). Missing or not applicable is coded as null (blank)
